name: iShares Gold Trust
description: The iShares Gold Trust (IAUM) is an exchange-traded fund (ETF) designed to track the price of gold bullion. Established by BlackRock, Inc., it offers investors a simple and cost-effective way to gain exposure to the performance of gold without the complexities associated with physical ownership. Each share of IAUM represents a fractional ownership in the gold held by the trust, which is stored in secure vaults. This makes it an appealing investment vehicle for those looking to hedge against inflation, market volatility, or economic uncertainty, as gold has historically been viewed as a safe haven asset. The trust’s objective is to reflect the performance of the price of gold bullion, less the trust's expenses. Investors can buy and sell shares of IAUM on the stock exchange just like any other stock, providing liquidity and ease of access. IAUM appeals to both individual and institutional investors seeking to diversify their portfolios with gold exposure. The fund is managed with a focus on transparency and efficient tracking of gold prices, making it a popular choice among investors looking for a straightforward way to invest in gold.
